text: Yanam is a town in the Yanam district, Union territory of Puducherry, India. This town along with nearby villages form the district in East Godavari district of Andhra Pradesh. ==Population== According to the 2011 Census of India, the total population of Yanam is 55,626. The literacy rate of the city is 79.47% ==References== Category:Towns in Puducherry
title: Yanam
